item.title: 阿托斯集团在推出欧盟生物识别边境系统时遭遇挫折
item.description:
财政和技术问题加剧了人们对该集团能否改革其边境管理方式的担忧

【原文：

Financial and technical problems are fueling concern about whether the bloc can revamp its approach to borders

】

item.title: 人类生殖规则即将改变
item.description:
在彭博社原创系列《后人类》的这一集中，我们将探讨 IVG 如何改变物种繁衍的方式。【原文：

On this episode of the Bloomberg Originals series Posthuman, we investigate how IVG has the ability to transform the way a species reproduces.

】

item.title: 英国金融体系有多稳定？
item.description:
在本期《In the City》节目中，英格兰银行的纳特-本杰明（Nat Benjamin）将讨论最新金融稳定报告的结果。【原文：

On this episode of In the City, the Bank of England’s Nat Benjamin discusses results from the latest financial stability report.

】

item.title: 许多中国铜贸易商因担心关税而停止进口美国废铜
item.description: 据北京安泰科信息发展有限公司（Beijing Antaike Information Development Co.【原文：Many Chinese metal importers have stopped buying US copper scrap in anticipation of tariffs when Donald Trump assumes the presidency, according to Beijing Antaike Information Development Co.】

item.title: 马科斯否认菲律宾弹劾杜特尔特案
item.description: 菲律宾总统小费迪南德-马科斯（Ferdinand Marcos Jr.）一直与副总统萨拉-杜特尔特（Sara Duterte）不和，尽管萨拉-杜特尔特明显威胁要杀死他，但小费迪南德-马科斯放弃了弹劾副总统的努力。【原文：Philippines President Ferdinand Marcos Jr., who has been locked in a feud with Vice President Sara Duterte, disavowed an effort to impeach his deputy despite her apparent threat to have him killed.】

item.title: 香港房地产公司侨福集团寻求私人贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港房地产开发商侨福集团（Parkview Group）正在寻求至少 28 亿港元（3.6 亿美元）的私人信贷资金，以对银行贷款进行再融资。【原文：The Parkview Group, a real estate developer in Hong Kong, is seeking private credit funding of at least HK$2.8 billion ($360 million) to refinance a bank loan, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 政府顾问警告：日本需要在债务问题上敲响警钟
item.description: 一位政府顾问表示，信用评级公司警告可能会下调主权债券评级，这对日本来说是一个警钟。【原文：Japan could use a wake-up call over its mountain of debt through credit rating firms warning of the potential for cuts to sovereign bond ratings, according to a government advisor.】

item.title: 中国央行行长发出支持 2025 年经济的信号
item.description: 中国央行行长重申了明年采取支持性货币政策促进经济增长的计划，因为在唐纳德-特朗普的第二个任期内，中国经济面临着与美国迫在眉睫的贸易战带来的新挑战。【原文：China’s central bank governor reaffirmed plans for a supportive monetary policy to promote growth next year, as the economy faces fresh challenges from a looming trade war with the US during Donald Trump’s second term.】

item.title: 外国人回流，印度贸易商迎来圣诞反弹
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 印度保险公司寻求零息债券以管理长期风险
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度保险公司已要求政府发行新的主权债务工具，包括零息债券，以扩大他们的投资机会。【原文：Indian insurers have asked the government to issue new sovereign debt instruments, including zero-coupon bonds, to broaden investment opportunities available to them, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英特尔首席执行官离职为新交易讨论打开大门
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp.英特尔公司首席执行官帕特-盖尔辛格（Pat Gelsinger）的突然离职为这家陷入困境的公司提供了一个新的机会来考虑潜在的交易方案，包括他在管理这家芯片制造商期间拒绝接受的方案。【原文：The abrupt departure of Intel Corp. Chief Executive Officer Pat Gelsinger offers a fresh opportunity for the troubled company to consider potential deal options, including scenarios that he rejected during his time running the chipmaker.】

item.title: 增长乏力，关税风险，中国人民币跌至一年低点
item.description: 人民币对美元汇率跌至约一年来的最低水平，原因是交易员增加了对中国经济增长乏力的看跌押注，同时面临美国提高关税的风险。【原文：The yuan fell to the lowest level in about a year versus the greenback, as traders added bearish wagers on lackluster China growth amid risks of higher US tariffs.】

item.title: 对冲基金转而看跌新西兰元，因为新西兰央行可能再次大幅降息
item.description: 由于越来越多的人预期新西兰央行将继续快速降息，对冲基金一年来首次转而看跌新西兰元。【原文：Hedge funds have swung to a bearish position on the New Zealand dollar for the first time in a year amid growing expectations the central bank will keep rapidly cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 澳大利亚能源股随着项目增加有望反弹
item.description: 据分析师称，随着几个停滞项目开始投产，澳大利亚岌岌可危的能源库存明年可能会出现逆转。【原文：Australia’s flailing energy stocks may reverse course next year as several stalled projects start production, according to analysts.】

item.title: 网络星期一 135 亿美元的消费额超出初步预测
item.description: 据 Adobe 公司称，美国购物者在 "网络星期一 "期间的网上消费有望达到 135 亿美元，略高于该公司最初预测的 132 亿美元。【原文：US shoppers are on track to spend as much as $13.5 billion online during Cyber Monday, according to Adobe Inc., slightly beating the firm’s initial forecast of $13.2 billion.】

item.title: 星展银行为俄罗斯富豪聘请私人银行家，竞争对手望而却步
item.description: 星展集团控股有限公司（DBS Group Holdings Ltd.）加强了其财富管理团队，以迎合富有的俄罗斯人的需求，而此时许多全球竞争对手正因担心制裁风险扩大而远离这一业务。【原文：DBS Group Holdings Ltd. has beefed up its wealth management team to cater to rich Russians at a time when many global rivals are staying away from the business amid concerns over widening sanction risks.】

item.title: 大亨寻求避免在越南最大欺诈案中被处决
item.description: 越南地产大亨张美兰（Truong My Lan）因策划了该国有史以来最大的诈骗丑闻而被判处死刑，法庭准备对她的上诉作出裁决，她是否可以免于死刑，将在法庭上听证。【原文：Vietnamese property tycoon Truong My Lan is set to hear whether she’ll be spared execution as a court prepares to rule on her appeal against the death sentence for masterminding the country’s largest ever fraud scandal.】

item.title: 欧佩克+会议仍是焦点，石油价格维持在紧张区间
item.description: 在本周四举行的一次关键会议之前，交易商在关注欧佩克+供应计划的线索，石油价格变化不大。【原文：Oil was little changed as traders watched for clues on OPEC+’s supply plans ahead of a key meeting this Thursday.】

item.title: 出口量再次下降，新西兰经济衰退风险加大
item.description: 新西兰出口量连续第二个季度下降，加剧了年中衰退的迹象。【原文：New Zealand export volumes fell for a second straight quarter, adding to signs of a mid-year recession.】

item.title: 日本央行权衡日本泡沫破灭以来首次加息三次的理由
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫有大量数据支持在 12 月上调基准利率，这将是自 1989 年日本资产泡沫达到顶峰以来首次在一个日历年内三次收紧政策。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda has plenty of data to support the case for raising the benchmark rate in December, an outcome that would mark the first tightening of policy three times in a calendar year since the peak of Japan’s asset bubble in 1989.】

item.title: 震惊市场的日元套利交易有卷土重来的迹象
item.description: 日元利差交易--一种今年以惊人方式爆发的投资策略--正在重新受到欢迎。【原文：The yen carry trade — an investment strategy that blew up in spectacular fashion this year — is regaining popularity.】

item.title: 韩国 11 月通胀率升幅低于预期
item.description: 韩国消费者通胀率的上升速度低于预期，连续第三个月保持在央行目标值以下，这表明物价趋于稳定。【原文：The pace of South Korea’s consumer inflation picked up less than expected and stayed below the central bank’s target for a third month, in a sign of price stability.】

item.title: 亚洲股市收涨，华尔街等待数据：市场综述
item.description: 在华尔街，全球最大科技公司的反弹推动股市创下历史新高，亚洲股市也将紧随其后。【原文：Asian stocks are set to follow the positive lead from Wall Street where a rally in the world’s largest technology companies drove stocks to fresh all-time highs.】

item.title: Evercore 聘请摩根士丹利前卫生主管乔-莫迪塞特
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，Evercore Inc. 聘请了资深医疗保健银行家约瑟夫-莫迪塞特（Joseph Modisett）担任高级常务董事。【原文：Evercore Inc. hired veteran health-care banker Joseph Modisett as a senior managing director, according to a person briefed on the matter.】

item.title: 霍尼韦尔削减指导计划，与庞巴迪喷气发动机诉讼达成和解
item.description: 霍尼韦尔国际公司（Honeywell International Inc.【原文：Honeywell International Inc. and aircraft maker Bombardier Inc. reached a deal on the development of aviation technology and settled a long-running legal dispute.】

item.title: 超牛中国 ETF 吸引 5500 万美元认购热潮
item.description: 本周初，交易员们在追踪中国基准股指的杠杆式交易所交易基金中花费了约5500万美元购买看涨期权，这是继上周五出现的异常买盘之后的又一买盘。【原文：Traders spent about $55 million on bullish call options at the start of the week in a levered exchange-traded fund tracking China’s benchmark stock index, adding to unusual buying seen on Friday.】

item.title: 美国牛肉短缺削弱利润，泰森将关闭堪萨斯工厂
item.description: 泰森食品公司（Tyson Foods Inc.【原文：Tyson Foods Inc. will shut a meat plant in Kansas next year, eliminating 809 jobs, as the company seeks to slash costs amid a downturn in the beef industry.】

item.title: Microchip 表示将关闭亚利桑那州工厂，并更新了前景展望
item.description: 汽车、消费设备和其他产品芯片制造商微芯科技公司（Microchip Technology Inc.【原文：Microchip Technology Inc., a maker of chips for cars, consumer devices and other products, said it would close a plant in Tempe, Arizona, affecting about 500 employees.】

item.title: Trinity Investments 表示有意收购 Sunstone 房地产投资信托基金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Trinity Investments 已表示有意收购 Sunstone Hotel Investors Inc.【原文：Trinity Investments has expressed interest in acquiring Sunstone Hotel Investors Inc., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美联储威廉姆斯称 "随着时间推移 "可能需要更多降息举措
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）表示，现在通胀和就业风险已变得更加平衡，官员们可能需要进一步降低利率，使政策趋于中性。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said officials will likely need to lower rates further to move policy to a neutral stance now that risks to inflation and employment have become more balanced.】
